body:
From the last video I got really good feedback from you guys and I appreciate that a lot. I've done a lot of things you guys asked like lowering the game volume, making the gameplay better etc. Tell me what you guys think of this - is it bad or is it good? Again it would mean a lot to me if you could just put your opinion; you don't have to watch the whole thing just skip through the video and tell me what you think of the gameplay and commentary :). Thank you.

Remember to watch in 720p for best quality

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-8diNk8dyHU

title: New Intro / Evolve #2
